name: Intern (GroupNine)
description:
Intern is a light-hearted top down chaotic office game about task management, stress and the monotony of office jobs. Players are controlling the Intern Character who works a 9 - 5 job.

Each level is 3 minutes long and players have to complete a series of tasks to earn money in order to progress to the next level. As players are assigned more tasks, their stress bar will increase and when it reaches 100%, will enter rage mode. 

Rage mode decreases the stress bar but players can also speed up this process by smashing the environment around them, however, they are charged for the damages.

During other levels, players will have to continue managing tasks while dealing with environmental challenges such as fires and faulty lighting.
